thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 5 of 1920
thread.title: Robin

author: Robin
title: Robin
text: I like flighthub for it's ease of usage. Initially found Manulife to be an obstacle but once discovered how to delete them from the cost it was an easy breeze as I said. I have annual medical coverage and only require flight cancellation insurance which I can't access here. As an oldie not trained on computers I find my way around Flighthub easily. Their price is usually a few dollars less and wonderful no extra fee for usage.
